Detailed Description

Native format for the persistent data of a Pokémon in Generation I.

This data is available both when the Pokémon is in the trainer's party or in the PC.

Field Documentation

◆ species

uint8_t pksav_gen1_pc_pokemon::species

Species index.

◆ current_hp

uint16_t pksav_gen1_pc_pokemon::current_hp

The Pokémon's current HP.

This value should never be higher than pksav_gen1_pokemon_party_data_t.max_hp.

◆ level

uint8_t pksav_gen1_pc_pokemon::level

The Pokémon's level.

This value is also stored in pksav_gen1_pokemon_party_data_t.level.

◆ condition

uint8_t pksav_gen1_pc_pokemon::condition

The Pokémon's status ailments, if any.

The enum ::pksav_gb_condition_t contains all valid values for this field.

◆ types

uint8_t pksav_gen1_pc_pokemon::types[PKSAV_GEN1_POKEMON_NUM_TYPES]

Indices for each of this Pokémon's types.

If the Pokémon has a single type, then both of these values are equal to that type's index.

These fields have no real use in a save editing program and should have simply been in a lookup table on the ROM itself.

The enum ::pksav_gen1_type_t contains all valid values for this field.

◆ catch_rate

uint8_t pksav_gen1_pc_pokemon::catch_rate

The Pokémon's catch rate.

This value has no real use in a save editing program and should have simply been in a lookup table on the ROM itself.

◆ moves

uint8_t pksav_gen1_pc_pokemon::moves[PKSAV_GEN1_POKEMON_NUM_MOVES]

Indices for each of this Pokémon's moves.

◆ ot_id

uint16_t pksav_gen1_pc_pokemon::ot_id

The Pokémon's original trainer's ID (stored in big-endian).

This value should be accessed and set with pksav_bigendian16.

◆ exp

uint8_t pksav_gen1_pc_pokemon::exp[PKSAV_GEN1_POKEMON_EXPERIENCE_BUFFER_SIZE]

The Pokémon's current total experience points (stored in Base-256).

This value should be accessed with pksav_import_base256 (with a num_bytes value of 3) and set with pksav_export_base256.

◆ ev_hp

uint16_t pksav_gen1_pc_pokemon::ev_hp

The Pokémon's HP EV stat (stored in big-endian).

This value should be accessed and set with pksav_bigendian16.

◆ ev_atk

uint16_t pksav_gen1_pc_pokemon::ev_atk

The Pokémon's Attack EV stat (stored in big-endian).

This value should be accessed and set with pksav_bigendian16.

◆ ev_def

uint16_t pksav_gen1_pc_pokemon::ev_def

The Pokémon's Defense EV stat (stored in big-endian).

This value should be accessed and set with pksav_bigendian16.

◆ ev_spd

uint16_t pksav_gen1_pc_pokemon::ev_spd

The Pokémon's Speed EV stat (stored in big-endian).

This value should be accessed and set with pksav_bigendian16.

◆ ev_spcl

uint16_t pksav_gen1_pc_pokemon::ev_spcl

The Pokémon's Special EV stat (stored in big-endian).

This value should be accessed and set with pksav_bigendian16.

◆ iv_data

uint16_t pksav_gen1_pc_pokemon::iv_data

The Pokémon's IV's, stored as a bitset.

These values should be accessed with ::pksav_get_gb_IV and set with pksav_set_gb_IV.

◆ move_pps

uint8_t pksav_gen1_pc_pokemon::move_pps[PKSAV_GEN1_POKEMON_NUM_MOVES]

The Pokémon's PPs and number of PP Ups used for each move.

Mask an index with ::PKSAV_GEN1_MOVE_PP_MASK to get the move PP.

Mask an index with ::PKSAV_GEN1_MOVE_PP_UP_MASK to get the number of PP Ups applied to the move.
